PREF.NAME: compiler.maximum_processors_usage
PREF.DESCRIPTION: The maximum number of processors to use during compilation. Used '0' to use all available processors.

PREF.NAME: debugger.critical_stack_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Stack overflow detection: depth of stack at which execution will pause and ask whether it is ok to continue (only works in classic Eiffel).

PREF.NAME: debugger.debug_output_evaluation
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display DEBUG_OUTPUT.debug_output for objects whose base class inherits from DEBUG_OUTPUT.

PREF.NAME: debugger.default_displayed_string_size
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Default number of displayed characters of a STRING (increasing this value might slow down debugging).

PREF.NAME: debugger.default_expanded_view_size
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Default number of displayed characters in the expanded view (increasing this value might slow down debugging).

PREF.NAME: debugger.default_maximum_stack_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Default number of call stack elements shown in Call Stack tool (-1 to show all of them).

PREF.NAME: debugger.delay_before_cleaning_objects_grid
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Delay (in milliseconds) before clearing the stacks and objects grid. By tuning this value, you can reduce the potential flickering of the related grid.

PREF.NAME: debugger.display_agent_details
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should the info about the agent object be displayed?

PREF.NAME: debugger.dotnet_debugger
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Which .NET debugger to launch: `EiffelStudio Dbg' will use the EiffelStudio debugger; `cordbg' will use the command line debugger from the .NET Framework SDK; `DebugCLR' will use the graphical debugger from the .NET Framework SDK.

PREF.NAME: debugger.expanded_display_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color for expanded display view (default is white, change it to better see white space at end of lines in displayed text).

PREF.NAME: debugger.generating_type_evaluation
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display the base type of an object if enabled, otherwise just the base class (disabling it might speed up debugging). e.g: might display ARRAY [STRING] if True but will just display ARRAY if False.

PREF.NAME: debugger.interrupt_every_N_instructions
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Number of instructions that will be executed before interrupting the execution.

PREF.NAME: debugger.classic_debugger.close_dbg_daemon_on_end_of_debugging
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Close the Eiffel debugger daemon (classic) after each debug session (recommended)

PREF.NAME: debugger.classic_debugger.timeout
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Timeout used to start the Eiffel debugger daemon (classic only). Leave it to 0 to use the default environment value.

PREF.NAME: debugger.classic_debugger.debugger_location
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Path to the Eiffel debugger daemon (classic). Leave it empty to use the default environment value.

PREF.NAME: debugger.always_compile_before_debug
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Do not show the dialog that asks if a compilation should be started before running the debug if there where changes in classes.

PREF.NAME: debugger.dotnet.keep_stepping_info_dotnet_feature
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should we always try to debug non-Eiffel code in case it calls back into some Eiffel code?

PREF.NAME: debugger.last_saved_stack_path
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Disk location of last saved stack path information.

PREF.NAME: debugger.left_debug_layout
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Items/tools shown in navigation layout when in debug mode.

PREF.NAME: debugger.max_evaluation_duration
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Maximum evaluation duration before cancelling evaluation. (this is only applicable for a .NET system)

PREF.NAME: debugger.max_slice
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Largest number of items displayed in list data.

PREF.NAME: debugger.min_slice
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Smallest number of items displayed in list data.

PREF.NAME: debugger.project_toolbar_layout
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Project toolbar items and layout information.

PREF.NAME: debugger.proportion
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of the local/arguments part of the `Objects' tab in the Debugging tool.

PREF.NAME: debugger.right_debug_layout
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Items/tools shown on editor side when in debug mode.

PREF.NAME: debugger.select_call_stack_level_on_double_click
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Select call stack entry on double click?

PREF.NAME: debugger.stack_grid_layout_managed
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Enable/Disable the layout management for the stack values (keep value expanded or not, and highlight difference).

PREF.NAME: debugger.debugged_grid_layout_managed
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Enable/Disable the layout management for the debugged values (keep value expanded or not, and highlight difference).

PREF.NAME: debugger.watches_grids_layout_managed
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Enable/Disable the layout management for the watches expressions (keep value expanded or not, and highlight difference).

PREF.NAME: debugger.grid_column_layout_stack_objects
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Configuration of the stack objects grid.%N This should be a list of 5 sequences: nature_id;is_shown;is_auto_resized;width;header_name; %NThe position in the list indicate the column.%NThe nature_id are: 1:name; 2:value; 3:type; 4:address; 5:context...

PREF.NAME: debugger.grid_column_layout_debugged_objects
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Configuration of the debugged objects grid.%NCheck grid_column_layout_stack_objects for full description.

PREF.NAME: debugger.grid_column_layout_watches
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Configuration of the watches objects grid. %NCheck grid_column_layout_stack_objects for full description.

PREF.NAME: debugger.objects_tool_layout
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Location of main objects tool's items <<'Current object', 'Stack information', 'Argument(s)', 'Local(s)', 'Result', 'Dropped references'>>. The left grid is represented by '#1' and the right grid by '#2'

PREF.NAME: debugger.show_text_in_project_toolbar
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should text be shown alongside preselected toolbar items?

PREF.NAME: debugger.show_all_text_in_project_toolbar
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is text of toolbar items displayed?

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_class_name_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for class names in BON class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_class_name_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for class names in BON class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_class_uncompiled_fill_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for uncompiled BON class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_class_generics_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for generics in BON class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_class_generics_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for generics in BON class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_client_label_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for feature names on BON client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_client_label_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for feature names on BON client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_client_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for BON client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_client_line_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Line width for BON client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_cluster_name_area_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: BON cluster name area fill color.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.bon.bon_inheritance_line_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Line width for BON inheritance links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_name_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for class names in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_deferred_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for names of deferred classes in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_properties_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for class properties in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_properties_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for class properties in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_name_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for class names in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_generics_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for generics in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_generics_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for generics in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_features_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for class features in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_features_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for class features in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_feature_section_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for class feature sections in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_class_feature_section_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for class feature sections in UML class figures.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_client_line_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Line width for UML client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_client_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for UML client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_client_label_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for feature names on UML client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_client_label_font
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Font for feature names on UML client supplier links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_cluster_name_area_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: UML cluster name area fill color.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.uml.uml_inheritance_line_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Line width for UML inheritance links.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.ancestor_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show ancestors of a class up to a level of preference value.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.autoscroll_speed
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Speed for scrolling when dragging figures from diagram near the edge of the diagram tool (a valid value is between 0 and 100).

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.client_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show clients of a class up to a level of preference value.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.descendant_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show descendants of a class down to a level of preference value.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.diagram_toolbar_layout
PREF.DESCRIPTION: The visible toolbar items for the Diagram Tool toolbar.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.excluded_class_figures
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Names of classes that should not appear in generated diagrams.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.ignore_excluded_class_figures
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show ALL classes in the diagram (ignore the following list)?

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.subcluster_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show subclusters of a cluster down to a level of preference value.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.supercluster_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show superclusters of a cluster up to a level of preference value.

PREF.NAME: tools.diagram_tool.supplier_depth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show suppliers of a class up to a level of preference value.

PREF.NAME: tools.context_tool.show_all_callers
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show all callers (as opposed to local callers) in `callers' form.

PREF.NAME: tools.context_tool.excluded_indexing_items
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Indexing items that need not be included in formatted texts.

PREF.NAME: tools.context_tool.default_class_formatter_index
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Class format that is selected by default.

PREF.NAME: tools.context_tool.default_feature_formatter_index
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Feature format that is selected by default.

PREF.NAME: tools.context_tool.formatters_history_size
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Number of cached formatted text in history.

PREF.NAME: tools.context_tool.default_dependency_formatter_index
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Default dependency formatter that should be popped up automatically.

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.automatic_go_to_result_panel
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show Detailed Result when computation done.

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.display_percentage_for_ratio
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is percentage for ratio metric displayed?

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.hide_old_archive
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should old archive items be hidden?

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.keep_detailed_result
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is detailed result kept when recalculation metric archive history?

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.old_archive_age_in_days
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Age in days for an archive item to be considered old

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.tree_view_for_metric_history
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is tree view used to display metric history?

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.unit_order
PREF.DESCRIPTION: List of metric units in order

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.check_defined_warning
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Check defined value warning when metric archive is recalculated?

PREF.NAME: tools.metric_tool.warning_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color for archive items whose recent calculated value violates pre-defined value criterion.

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.classes_categorized_folder
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should classes be categorized in physical folders where they locate?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.expand_referenced_class
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should referenced classes in dependency view be expanded by default?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.expand_referencer_class
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should referencer classes in dependency view be expanded by default?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.expand_categorized_folder_level
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should categorized folder level in dependency view be expanded by default?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.syntactical_classes
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should syntactical referenced classes be displayed?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.normal_referenced_classes
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Will normal referenced supplier/client classes be shown?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.folder_search_recursive
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Search a folder for classes recursively?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.class_flat_client_sorting_order
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Sorting order of flat clients of class.

PREF.NAME: tools.error_list.expand_errors
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Specifies if errors in the Error List tool should be expanded automatically, to show the verbose error information.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_apply_debugger_profiles
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog when applying debugger profiles.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_replace_all
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog on replacing all.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_finalize
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for C compilation on finalize operation.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_freeze
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for C compilation on freeze operation.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_save_before_compile
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog on compilation when some files have not been saved.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_finalize_assertions
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for assertions on finalize operation.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_clear_breakpoints
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog on clearing breakpoints.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_ignore_all_breakpoints
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog when starting the application without stopping at breakpoints.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_convert_project
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog before converting an old project.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_build_precompile
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog before building a needed precompile.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_delete_eis_entries
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog before deleting EIS entries.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.acknowledge_not_loaded
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog that warns that text is being loaded and is not editable or clickable.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_finalize_precompile
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for finalizing a .NET precompiled library.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_on_terminate_freezing
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for terminating the C compilation of a freeze.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_on_terminate_finalizing
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for terminating the C compilation of a finalize.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_on_terminate_process
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for terminating an ongoing C compilation while exiting EiffelStudio.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_on_terminate_external_command
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog for terminating an external command.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.show_starting_dialog
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display New/Open project dialog at startup.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_resource_change_needs_restart
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display warning dialog when changing resources that require you to restart EiffeStudio before they become effective.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.generate_homonyms
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog that warns that homonym format can take a long time.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.stop_execution_when_compiling
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog when an application is running and a compilation is launched.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_kill
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog before killing a debugged application.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_kill_and_restart
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog before killing a debugged application and restarting a new one.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_remove_metric
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog before removing a metric.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.confirm_save_metric
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog before saving a metric.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.already_editing_class
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog when editing the same class in two development windows.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.executing_command
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display dialog while running an external command.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.file_open_and_save_dialogs_remember_last_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: File open and save dialogs each remember their last selected directory.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_opened_dynamic_lib_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last dynamic lib library opened.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_opened_metric_browse_archive_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last metric browse archive opened.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_saved_dynamic_lib_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last dynamic lib saved.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_saved_call_stack_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last call stack saved.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_saved_debugger_exception_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last debugger exception saved.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_saved_diagram_postscript_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last diagram postscript file saved.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_saved_save_file_as_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last save file as saved.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_saved_profile_result_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last profile result saved.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.last_imported_metric_definition_directory
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Directory of last imported metric definition.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.project_settings_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Width of the project settings dialog.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.project_settings_height
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Height of the project settings dialog.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.project_settings_position_x
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Screen x position of the project settings dialog.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.project_settings_position_y
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Screen y position of the project settings dialog.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.open_project_dialog_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Width of the open project dialog.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.open_project_dialog_height
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Height of the open project dialog.

PREF.NAME: interface.dialogs.discard_target_scope_customized_formatter
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Display confirmation dialog of discarding target scope customized formatter.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.c_output_panel_prompted
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should the C output panel be shown when a C compilation is launched?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.auto_hide_animation_speed
PREF.DESCRIPTION: The speed, in milliseconds, in which the auto-hide tools will reveal or hide themselves completely. Use '0' to disable animation effect.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.show_all_applicable_docking_indicators
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should all applicable docking feedback indicators be shown when dragging a tool or a editor tab?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.output_tool_prompted
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should the output tool be shown when a compilation is launched?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.class_completion
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Allow class name completion in the address combo boxes?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.estudio_dbg_menu_accelerator_allowed
PREF.DESCRIPTION: When estudio_dbg_menu_enabled_preference is True, is EiffelStudio Debug menu shown by accelerator?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.estudio_dbg_menu_enabled
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should EiffelStudio Debug menu be shown

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.feature_clause_order
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Order used to sort feature clauses in formatted texts.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.maximum_history_size
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of items displayed in the history combo boxes.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.remember_completion_list_size
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should size of completion list be remembered between completions in the editor?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.show_text_in_refactoring_toolbar
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should selective text of toolbar items in general toolbar?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.show_all_text_in_refactoring_toolbar
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is text of toolbar items displayed?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.show_text_in_general_toolbar
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should selective text of toolbar items in general toolbar?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.show_all_text_in_general_toolbar
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is text of toolbar items displayed?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.unified_stone
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Link the context tool with other components by default?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.link_tools
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Link tools? True means that a tool propagates stone to other tools if possible.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.use_animated_icons
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Use animated icons in the status bar?

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.x_position
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Screen x position of development window.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.y_position
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Screen y position of development window.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.is_force_debug_mode
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Last time when closing development window if it was forcing debug mode.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.completion_list_height
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Height of completion list. Used if 'remember_completion_list_size' is set to True.

PREF.NAME: interface.development_window.completion_list_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Width of completion list. Used if 'remember_completion_list_size' is set to True.

PREF.NAME: recent_projects.keep_n_projects
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Number of recent projects to keep in the list.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.auto-complete_brackets_and_parentheses
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Are brackets and parentheses closed automatically?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.auto_auto-complete
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should completion window appear automatically after typing a `.'?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.auto_complete_words
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should completion automatically complete words when a single best match is available?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.auto_remove_trailing_blank_when_saving
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should trailing blanks be auto-removed when saving?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.customized_string_1
PREF.DESCRIPTION: User customized string inserted when user performs the key combination defined in Editor->Eiffel->Keyboard Shortcuts->Customized insertion 1.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.customized_string_2
PREF.DESCRIPTION: User customized string inserted when user performs the key combination defined in Editor->Eiffel->Keyboard Shortcuts->Customized insertion 2.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.customized_string_3
PREF.DESCRIPTION: User customized string inserted when user performs the key combination defined in Editor->Eiffel->Keyboard Shortcuts->Customized insertion 3.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.filter_completion_list
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should non-matching entries from completion list be hidden while completing? If not, all entries are shown and selection in completion list will change to the closest matching entry while completing.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.once_and_constant_in_upper
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Does completion change the first character of onces and constants with an upper case character?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.show_ANY_features
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Do features of class ANY appear in the feature call complete window?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.show_completion_signature
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Does completion list show feature signatures?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.show_completion_type
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Does completion list show query return type?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.show_completion_disambiguated_name
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Does completion list show disambiguated name?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.show_obsolete_items
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Does completion list show obsolete items?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.syntax_complete_enabled
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is completion of keywords enabled? The completion of keywords can be changed in Editor->Eiffel->Autocomplete.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.text_mode_is_windows
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Format to use when saving class text. True means using Windows text format, False means using Unix text format.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.editor
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Command to open an external editor.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.underscore_is_separator
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Is underscore `_' used as a word separator?

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.colors.breakpoint_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color for breakable marks and breakpoints.

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.indexing.custom_indexing_space
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Space after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.indexing.custom_indexing_return
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Return after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.class.custom_class_space
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Space after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.class.custom_class_return
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Return after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.inherit.custom_inherit_space
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Space after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.inherit.custom_inherit_return
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Return after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.creation.custom_creation_space
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Space after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.creation.custom_creation_return
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Return after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.feature.custom_feature_space
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Space after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.class_structure_keywords.feature.custom_feature_return
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Customized autocomplete (Return after keyword was typed)

PREF.NAME: editor.eiffel.autocomplete.feature_structure_keywords.is.custom_is_space

PREF.NAME: editor.general.automatic_update
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should we reload the content of a file automatically if no change has been made here and the file has been modified by an external editor?

PREF.NAME: editor.general.font_zoom_factor
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Zoom factor of editor font, set by ctrl + mouse wheel.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.left_margin_width
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Width of left margin in editor. Note: this is not the breakpoint margin, but the whitespace to the left of the editor.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.scrolling_common_line_count
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Number of lines that will stay visible when you perform a page down or a page up operation.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.mouse_wheel_scroll_full_page
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Does mouse wheel scroll documents a page at a time (If True, it overrides Mouse Wheel Scroll Size)?

PREF.NAME: editor.general.mouse_wheel_scroll_size
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Number of lines scrolled using the mouse wheel.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.quadruple_click_enabled
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Does a quadruple click select the entire document?

PREF.NAME: editor.general.remove_trailing_white_space
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Automatically remove trailing white space from lines?

PREF.NAME: editor.general.tab_step
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Number of spaces that a tabulation character represents.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.use_tab_for_indentation
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should tab character be used for auto-indentation?

PREF.NAME: editor.general.colors.margin_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color of line number margin.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.colors.margin_separator_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Color of separator between line number margin and editor.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.colors.cursor_line_highlight_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color used to highlight line with cursor in it.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.colors.highlight_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color used to highlight lines.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.colors.focus_out_selection_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color of selected text when not focused.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.use_buffered_line
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if editor line drawing is first buffered and then drawn, or just drawn directly to the screen. If set to True, content will not flicker, but drawing performance will be reduced.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.show_line_numbers
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if editor displays the line numbers by default.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.smart_home
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if editor should go to the beginning on the first non-whitespace character, on a line, when the HOME key is pressed.

PREF.NAME: editor.general.new_tab_at_left
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Place new editor tab at left side of editor's area?

PREF.NAME: general.acrobat_reader
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Command to read Adobe Acrobat files.

PREF.NAME: general.show_hidden_preferences
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show hidden preferences in preference window?

PREF.NAME: general.locale
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Locale current system uses. (Restart to take effect)

PREF.NAME: general.pnd_mode
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Use Pick and Drop mode? Contextual mode if false.

PREF.NAME: tools.search_tool.init_only_compiled_classes
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Initial status of only compiled classes.

PREF.NAME: tools.search_tool.none_result_keyword_field_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color of none result keyword field.

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.show_unchanged_feature_from_any
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show unchanged features in class ANY by default?

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.odd_row_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color of odd rows in class browser.

PREF.NAME: tools.class_browser.even_row_background_color
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Background color of even rows in class browser.

PREF.NAME: tools.refactoring.feature_rename.new_feature_name
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Default name for a renamed feature.

PREF.NAME: tools.refactoring.feature_rename.update_comments
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should occurrences of the feature name in comments be changed?

PREF.NAME: tools.refactoring.feature_rename.update_strings
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should occurrences of the feature name in strings be changed?

PREF.NAME: tools.refactoring.class_rename.file_rename
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should file be renamed to a new name?

PREF.NAME: tools.refactoring.class_rename.update_comments
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should occurrences of the class name in comments be changed?

PREF.NAME: tools.refactoring.class_rename.update_strings
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Should occurrences of the class name in strings be changed?

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.general.focus_on_class_address
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Focus on class address input field.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.general.close_focusing_docking_tool_or_editor
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Close focusing docking tool or editor.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.code_completion.toggle_show_type
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show/hide show type in completion list.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.code_completion.toggle_show_disambiguated_name
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show/hide disambiguated name in completion list.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.code_completion.toggle_show_obsolete_items
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show/hide obsolete features in completion list.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.collapse_all_levels
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Trigger collapsing of all tree nodes.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.collapse_tree_node
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Trigger collapsing of current tree node.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.expand_all_levels
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Trigger expansion of all tree nodes.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.expand_tree_node
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Trigger expansion of current tree node.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.search_selection_forward
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Trigger search on current selection and goes to next result.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.search_selection_backward
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Trigger search on current selection and goes to previous result.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.show_search_and_replace_panel
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Trigger display of search panel focused on replace.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.embed_if_clause
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Embed current line in if clause.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.embed_debug_clause
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Embed current line in debug clause

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.editor.show_goto_dialog
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Show dialog to set current editor cursor line.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.file.new_tab
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to create a new tabbed editor.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.file.new_window
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to create a new development window.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.file.save
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to save current editing file.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.tools.show_search_report_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display Search Report tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.tools.show_c_output_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display C Output tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.tools.show_external_output_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display External output tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.tools.show_errors_and_warnings_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display Error and Warnings tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.tools.show_feature_relation_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display Feature Relation tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.tools.show_contract_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display the Contract Editor tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.tools.show_testing_result_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display Testing Result tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.go_back
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to go back in the history.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.go_forth
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to go forth in the history.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.send_to_context
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to send Class/Feature to tools.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.basic_text_view
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display basic text view.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.view.clickable_text_view
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display clickable text view.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.project.search_new_class_and_compile
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to search new classes and compile current project.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.project.check_overrides_and_compile
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to check overrides and compile current project.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.project.go_to_next_error
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to jump to the next compilation error.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.project.go_to_previous_error
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to jump to the previous compilation error.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.project.go_to_next_warning
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to jump to the next compilation warning.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.project.go_to_previous_warning
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to jump to the previous compilation warning.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.debug.step_into
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to step into a routine.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.debug.step_out_of_routine
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to step out of a routine.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.debug.run_ignore_breakpoints
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to run debugged application ignoring breakpoints.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.debug.show_call_stack_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display Call Stack tool.

PREF.NAME: shortcuts.debug.show_object_viewer_tool
PREF.DESCRIPTION: Shortcut to display Object Viewer tool.
